thread.section_title: Wurf Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wurf | www.wurf.com
thread.title: Tara Connolly

author: Tara Connolly
title: Tara Connolly
text: Wurf truly provides excellent customer service. I received my Wurf Board quicker than I thought I would. While the product did not work out for me personally, I have three colleagues and friends that have now ordered Wurf Boards. Customer service was very helpful with my return process. While the Wurf Board is not for me, it is an great product for others with a wonderful team! Thank you!
